subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Riccardo Ricco won the eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia by breaking away from a group of about 40 riders in the last 100 meters, and Giovanni Visconti kept the overall lead for a third day.
snippet: Riccardo Ricco won the eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia by breaking away from a group of about 40 riders in the last 100 meters, and Giovanni Visconti kept the overall lead for a third day.
